advantage.name: Accurate Attack
entries: When you make an accurate attack (see Maneuvers, page 177) you can take a penalty of up to –5 on the effect modifier of the attack and add the same number (up to +5) to your attack bonus.

advantage.name: All-out Attack
entries: When you make an all-out attack (see Maneuvers, page 177) you can take a penalty of up to –5 on your active defenses (Dodge and Parry) and add the same number (up to +5) to your attack bonus.
